Class ProducerConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProducerConsumer

  • public class ProducerConsumer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ProducerConsumer.Buffer
      Encapsulates the data and operations on the fixed-length queue.
      class  ProducerConsumer.Consumer
      Threads that remove items from the queue.
      class  ProducerConsumer.Producer
      Threads that add items to the queue.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProducerConsumer(int items, int bufferSize, int consumers)
      Creates a new example of the producer/consumer problem.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProducerConsumer

        public ProducerConsumer(int items,
                int bufferSize,
                int consumers)
        Creates a new example of the producer/consumer problem. The arguments specify the number of items the producer will add, the size of the queue that will hold the items, and the number of consumers that access the queue.
        Parameters:
        items - the number of items for the producer to add
        bufferSize - the size of the fixed-length queue
        consumers - the number of consumers to create

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates an instance of the producer/consumer problem given parameters specified on the command line.
        Parameters:
        args - an array containing the decimal representation of the number of items to add, the size of the queue, and the number of consumers in its first three elements
